```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Loading libraries           
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytuesdayR)
library(ggthemes)
library(scales)
```

Loading dataset
```{r}
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load('2021-04-06')
```


A lot of datasets!  Let's take a quick look at each.
```{r}
forest <- tuesdata$forest %>%
  view()

forest %>%
  group_by(entity) %>%
  summarize(mean_nfc = mean(net_forest_conversion)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(entity = fct_reorder(entity, mean_nfc)) %>% #WHY ISN'T THIS SORTING??!!
  view()
  
  
```
